vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Related to: σπουδ-αιότης, ητος, ἡ,
earnestness, seriousness, goodness, ἤθους [LXX+5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: earnestly, zealously, with vigor; (compar.) all the more eager, with special urgency eagerly
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
earnestly, zealously, with vigor; (compar.) all the more eager, with special urgency eagerly
earnestly, eagerly, diligently, Lk. 7:4; 2Tim. 1:17; Tit. 3:13; comparative σπουδαιοτέρως, more earnestly, with special urgency, Phil. 2:28
vocabInfos._es_Definition: comparativo: más ardientemente, con todo el empeño o con gran urgencia (FIL.2:28)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: cách sốt sắng hơn; cách tha thiết hơn
